extractedClauses.title: Payment Terms
extractedClauses.content: Payment shall be made in monthly installments of $20,833.33

extractedClauses.title: Project Timeline
extractedClauses.content: Project shall be completed within 12 months from commencement

extractedClauses.title: Deliverables
extractedClauses.content: Contractor shall deliver functional web application with admin dashboard

extractedClauses.title: Intellectual Property
extractedClauses.content: All work product shall be owned by Client upon full payment

extractedClauses.title: Liability Cap
extractedClauses.content: Total liability shall not exceed the total contract value

riskFlags.title: Budget Mismatch
riskFlags.description: Contract total ($250,000) is lower than proposal budget ($275,000)
riskFlags.recommendation: Clarify scope reduction or request contract amendment to match proposal budget
riskFlags.impact: May result in reduced deliverables or quality compromises

riskFlags.title: Timeline Discrepancy
riskFlags.description: Contract specifies 12 months but proposal indicates 8 months
riskFlags.recommendation: Align timeline expectations or adjust milestones accordingly

riskFlags.title: Support Period Missing
riskFlags.description: Contract does not mention 6-month post-launch support from proposal
riskFlags.recommendation: Add amendment to include post-launch support terms
riskFlags.impact: Client may lack expected support after delivery

riskFlags.title: SLA Requirement Not Addressed
riskFlags.description: Proposal requires 99.9% uptime SLA but contract has no SLA clause
riskFlags.recommendation: Add SLA commitments matching proposal requirements
riskFlags.impact: No recourse if system availability falls below expectations

clauseComparisons.notes: Contract amount is $25,000 less than proposed
Contract does not specify required technologies

clauseComparisons.contractValue: Client owns all work product upon payment

clauseComparisons.proposalValue: Customer portal, admin dashboard, API docs, training
clauseComparisons.notes: Contract missing API documentation and training materials
Post-launch support not mentioned in contract
Payment structure reasonable but not explicitly proposed
